thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Maxis Bhd Announces Qtrly Net Profit ‍559 Million RGT

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Maxis Bhd Announces Qtrly Net Profit ‍559 Million RGT
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Maxis Bhd:
* QTRLY NET PROFIT ‍559 MILLION RGT * QTRLY REVENUE ‍2.15​ BILLION RGT * YEAR-AGO QTRLY REVENUE 2.21 BILLION RGT; YEAR-AGO QTRLY NET PROFIT 505 MILLION RGT
* ‍BOARD DECLARES AN INTERIM SINGLE-TIER TAX-EXEMPT DIVIDEND OF 5 SEN PER ORDINARY SHARE​
* EXPECTS SERVICE REVENUE TO DECLINE IN LOW SINGLE DIGITS WITH EBITDA DECLINING AT MID SINGLE DIGIT LEVEL FOR FY ENDING 31 DEC 2018‍​
* 2018 BASE CAPITAL EXPENDITURE SEEN AT 1.0 BILLION RGT Source text: ( bit.ly/2BKvFRx ) Further company coverage:
